name: pnp-list-large-files-within-a-site
title: List all large files within a SharePoint Site
shortDescription: Script will help you find every files in a specific SharePoint Online site that are over a certain size.
longDescription: The following script will help you find every files in a specific SharePoint Online site that are over a certain size. It iterates through all libraries and identifies all files larger than the set threshold.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
